about_the_game:
This free base game includes the first playable chapter. Future chapters will be released as paid DLC

Step into the shoes of Rico Ché, a rising sharpshooter on a mission! In the atmospheric depths of a shadowy city, danger lurks at every turn. Outsmart your adversaries as you unravel the secrets hidden around Hobbe’s Gun Shop. Arm yourself with a variety of weapons to gain the upper hand—but beware, your enemies are more dangerous than they appear!

Outside Hobbe’s Gun Shop

The most renowned gun store in the city, Hobbe’s Gun Shop serves everyone—from first-time buyers to veteran marksmen perfecting their craft. But beneath its unassuming storefront lies a deeper mystery. Rumored to be a covert training ground, its secrets are yours to uncover—if you can find a way inside.

From behind the gates of the parking lot, behold the bustling city streets, where random passersby roam and cars cruise through the fog-drenched night, bringing the world to life.

Parking Lot Dwellers

The characters strolling in Hobbe’s Parking Lot may seem friendly —until you give them a reason not to be. From the casual citizens to the sharp-eyed security guard and the deadly Gunslinger, there’s plenty to deal with.

Enjoy their quirky lines and bold personalities, but don’t get too close—the Sharpshooter isn’t one to miss.

The Derelict Gate

A shadowy fence stands tall beside Hobbe’s Gun Shop, locked tight and long forgotten by the bustling city around it. Its origins are unclear, but those with ambition and resourcefulness seem to have claimed the area for their own pursuits.

What secrets lie behind the gate? Perhaps the answer isn’t what you expect—but those willing to explore might just uncover the tools they need to make progress.

Gear up and dive in—will you uncover the secret behind Hobbe’s Gun Shop?

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features physical and gun violence, including melee combat and ranged attacks. Players can engage in fistfights, use melee weapons such as rocks, knives, and grenades, or shoot enemies with firearms. When struck, enemies may stumble and react with pain or collapse into ragdoll physics upon death. Firearm impacts result in blood spray effects and bloody bullet holes, but there is no intense gore—no dismemberment, blood puddles, or smears. Explosions from grenades also cause harm to characters.

The game includes mild profanity such as "dammit" and "hell," but no explicit language. There is no sexual content. A "Healing Syringe" item is used to restore health through an injection animation, though this is not explicitly identified as a drug in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (7th Gen or newer) or AMD Ryzen 3 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe Graphics or equivalent, such as NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 or AMD Radeon RX 550 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A low-poly first-person shooter with challenging combat, realistic bullet-drop physics, and cartoony characters. Navigate a foggy urban lot, solve puzzles to uncover secrets, and face quirky foes with bold personalities. Can you crack the mystery of Hobbe’s Gun Shop?
